QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION:
Write SQL SELECT query to get total number of customers living in “Arizona”. Table : customer
customeridfirstnamelastnamecitystate
10101John1Gray1LyndenWashington
10298LyonBrownPinetopArizona
10299EloryKellerSnoqualmieWashington
10315LisaJonesOshkoshWisconsin
10325GingerSchultzPocatelloIdaho
10329KellyMendozaKailuaHawaii
10330ShawnDaltonKannonbeachOragon
10338MichelHowellTillamookOragon
10339AnthonySanchezWinslowArizona
10408ElronCleaverGlobeArizona
10410MaryAnnHowellCharlestonSouthCarolina
10449CofiAnnanTorontoIdhao
QUESTION.ANSWER: select count(*) from customer where state='Arizona';

public class MyClassOne
{
public static int countWords(String s){

if(s==null)
{
return 0;

}
if(s!=null){
String s1[]=s.split(" ");
return s1.length;
}
else
{

return 0;
}
}
public static void main(String arr[])
{
/* Main Method*/
System.out.println("length "+countWords(null));
}
}
